text: Abahakanyi bazashorerwa bajyanwa muri Jahanamu mu dutsiko, kugeza ubwo bazayigeraho maze imiryango yayo igafunguka, nuko abarinzi bayo bavuge bati "Ese ntimwagezweho n’intumwa zibaturutsemo, zibasomera amagambo (Ayat) ya Nyagasani wanyu, ndetse zinababurira kuzahura n’uyu munsi wanyu?"Bazavuga bati "Yego! Ahubwo ijambo ry’ibihano ryabaye impamo ku bahakanyi (ari bo twe)
